modmenu.descriptionTranslation.realcamer: Make the camera more realistic in the first-person view.
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_binding: Camera's offset from modelPart being bound
Note: camera's front, up and left are the X, Y and Z axes respectively
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_classic: Camera's offset from its rotation center
Note: player's front, up and left are the X, Y and Z axes respectively
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_compatS: These options will only appear if the corresponding mod is installed
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_cameraR: Note: Pitch, yaw and roll are rotations on the left, up and front axes respectively
config.option.xtracr_realcamera_compatsT: Please refer to the %s of this mod to see the list of supported mods and model part names
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_classic: Classic mode only makes simple changes to the position and rotation of camera
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_dynamic:
When enabled, the crosshair will follow the player's view, ensuring consistent hit result
Recommended to enable when Jade, WTHIT or similar mods are installed
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_renderM: Render player model in first-person perspective
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_adjustS: Length or 1/4 of the angle of the adjustment per step
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_scale: Control the size of the config values, 16 = 1 block
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_vanilla: Model part to bind camera to
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_adjustO: When pressing the adjustment key, adjust the offset or rotation of camera
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_offsetM: Move the model to camera to keep the camera position constant. Compatibility with other mods may become better when turned on
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_classic: Determine which to adjust when pressing the adjustment key
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_useModM:
Binding Mode config is automatically used if failed to find target model part
Status: %s 
(To refresh the status, you need to reload the config screen)
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_modMode: Name of the model part to bind camera to
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_disable: Possible options(There may be other options not listed here): %s
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_customC: Available options: [disable_mod, disable_rendering, allow_rendering_hand] and Model Part Names
